channel.title: MONITORING & OBSERVABILITY on Mussell Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in MONITORING & OBSERVABILITY on Mussell Portfolio

item.title: Kubernetes Monitoring Stack: Prometheus, Grafana, and AlertManager
item.description: Thoughts and lessons learned from implementing a production monitoring stack. Key insights on metric collection strategies, alerting best practices, and visualization techniques.

item.title: Kubernetes Monitoring Stack: Prometheus, Grafana, and AlertManager
item.description: Complete setup of a production-grade monitoring stack for Kubernetes clusters. Includes Prometheus for metrics collection, Grafana for visualization, and AlertManager for alerting. Covers service discovery, persistent storage, and high availability configurations.

item.title: eBPF for System Observability: Monitoring Linux Systems at the Kernel Level
item.description: Leveraging eBPF for advanced system observability and monitoring. This project demonstrates how to use eBPF programs to trace system calls, monitor network traffic, and gain deep insights into application behavior without modifying kernel code.
